page.title: 09THE TOP SHOP
page.content: I live in one of the shops in the village.It is called the Top Shop.The only other shop is the post office our shop used to be a pub called the Red Lion.In our shop we sell newspapers and magazine.The newspaper we sell the most of is the Northern Echo we sell 120 copies of it a day and it costs 18p,we also sell the mirror,the star,the daily express and the telegraph.The newspapers are brought to the shop by a van at 5'o'clock in the morning so my dad has to get up at 6'0'clock and sort them out.We have four paper boys to deliver to the houses.We also sell food bread, ham,beef frozen chickens,ice cream and lots of different tinned food.We sell toys and other different things there is one disadvantage I can never resist the sweets. By Claire Monteith AGE 9
